snippet: A business improvement district hired pedestrian traffic managers, who are mainly retired police officers, and placed them along Varick Street at Houston, Charlton and Vandam Streets.
abstract: Hudson Square Connection Business Improvement District hires pedestrian traffic managers to ease backed-up traffic near the Holland Tunnel during rush hour.
lead_paragraph: A business improvement district hired pedestrian traffic managers, who are mainly retired police officers, and placed them along Varick Street at Houston, Charlton and Vandam Streets.

headline.seo: Steely Traffic Managers Easing Holland Tunnel Snarls
headline.main: Steely Traffic Managers Ease a Holland Tunnel Snarl
headline.print_headline: Steely Traffic Managers Ease a Holland Tunnel Snarl
